english.segment1: If You washed away my vanity. If You took away my words. If all my world was swept away. Would You be enough for me?. Would my beating heart still sing?
english.segment2: If I lost it all. Would my hands stay lifted. To the God who gives and takes away
english.segment3: If You take it all. This life You've given. Still my heart will sing to You
english.segment4: When my life is not what I expected. The plans I made have failed. When there's nothing left to steal me away. Will You be enough for me?. Will my broken heart still sing?
english.segment5: If I lost it all. Would my hands stay lifted. To the God who gives. And takes away
english.segment6: If You take it all. This life You've given. Still my heart. Will sing to You
english.segment7: Even if You take it all away. Youll never let me go. Take it all away. But I still know
english.segment8: That I'm Yours. I'm still Yours
english.segment9: Oh, I'm Yours. I'm still Yours. I'm still Yours
